# we-divider
```html
<we-divider></we-divider>
```


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                     | Description                                            |
| ------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--divider-border`       | divider border <br> Default: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.12) |
| `--divider-margin-left`  | divider margin-left <br> Default: 0                    |
| `--divider-margin-right` | divider margin-right <br> Default: 0                   |
| `--divider-radius`       | divider radius <br> Default: 0.625rem                  |
| `--divider-width`        | divider width <br> Default: 100%                       |


----------------------------------------------
